en.content: Anger flashes in May’s eyes. “Would you strike a woman in her own house?” she snaps. “Eighteen people live on this street. If I scream, every one of them will come running.”
She scrambles from the guest room and into her bedroom. You consider pursuing the issue, but decide against it.

zh.content: 梅的眼中升起怒火，厉声喝道：“你敢在女人的家里打人吗？这街上可住着十八个人。只要我喊一声，所有人都会跑过来。”
她从客房夺路而出，回到她的卧室。你考虑继续追究这个问题，但最终决定放弃。

text.en: Secure your door with a chair and get some sleep
text.zh: 用椅子堵住门再小睡一会
